name: daily-standup
title: Daily Standup
description: Asynchronous Daily Standups without losing context
author: JustSteveKing

commands.name: authenticate
commands.title: Authenticate
commands.description: Sign in or Register to start posting your updates

commands.name: join
commands.title: Join Workspace
commands.description: Join a workspace using the access code.

commands.name: list
commands.title: List Workspaces
commands.description: List all workspaces that you are a member of.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
